Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The operation associated with log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The ID for correlated events. Can be used to identify correlated events between multiple tables.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: Log level of message (INFO, WARN, ERROR, etc.).
Columns.Name: LogLevel

Columns.Description: Name of the data source where the scan is run.
Columns.Name: DataSourceName

Columns.Description: Type of data source where the scan is run. For example: AzureDataExplorer, SQLServer etc.
Columns.Name: DataSourceType

Columns.Description: Name of the scan associated with the scan status log event.
Columns.Name: ScanName

Columns.Description: Number of assets discovered from the scan.
Columns.Name: AssetsDiscovered

Columns.Description: Number of assets classified from the scan.
Columns.Name: AssetsClassified

Columns.Description: Time spent by this scan waiting in the queue.
Columns.Name: ScanQueueTimeInSeconds

Columns.Description: Total time to complete the scan.
Columns.Name: ScanTotalRunTimeInSeconds

Columns.Description: Run Type of the scan. For example: Manual, Scheduled etc.
Columns.Name: RunType

Columns.Description: Error detail while running the scan.
Columns.Name: ErrorDetails

Columns.Description: Result of the scan at the current state. For example: Throttled, Queued etc.
Columns.Name: ResultType

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
